tweak.tweakDescription: This tweak allows players to walk their character in-game with a joystick. Additionally, it also includes an IV cheker, as well as other features. Includes support for Go+ and Gotcha.
tweak.tweakChangelog: • New Shinies and Possible Shiny icons • New Spinda and Giratina IV Filters • Map Loading Bug Fix • Fixed blank buttons • Some stability fixes for POST calls
